question: What was the main objective of introducing the Double Dome in Monuments of Indo-Islamic Architecture?
option1: To provide adequate strength to the monument
option2: To provide cooling effect inside the building
option3: To provide appropriate height to the monuments without losing aesthetic value
option4: None of the objectives mentioned in the statement A, B and C is correct
answer: To provide appropriate height to the monuments without losing aesthetic value
explanation: The 'Double Dome' was an important features in the Indo-Islamic architecture during the medieval times. A double dome is made of two layers. One layer produces ceiling to the interior and the second one crowns out. It is to provide height to the monuments.
